basics.name: Kalki Rose
basics.label: Cloud and Data Expert | Technical Account Lead | Engineering Manager
basics.summary:
Driven by a passion for technology that began with my first computer, equipped with 5 1/4' floppy disks (you know the ones that were actually bendy), I have spent the past 20 years honing my skills and expertise in the ever-evolving world of cloud and data platforms. My dedication to lifelong learning and continuous professional development has allowed me to collaborate with exceptional individuals across various industries, shaping my approach and expanding my capabilities with every new challenge.

As a supervisor and manager, I have found immense fulfillment in empowering those I work with, fostering their growth, and contributing to their success. As a key member of the leadership team, I have been instrumental in devising strategies, driving innovation, and facilitating the adoption of cutting-edge cloud and data solutions.

As a wise person I worked with once said, at the core all problems are people problems.

I am a continuous learner, both in technology and life, and recently became a certified scuba diving instructor!

work.name: Futurice
work.summary: During my four years at Futurice, I was promoted several times, and held multiple concurrent roles, as seen below.

work.name: Futurice
work.position: Cloud and Data Platforms Expertise Lead | Cloud Architect
highlights: Co-development of the internal cloud and data playbook used by development teams and sales to simplyfy the approach to project sale and delivery
Co-development of the internal center for learning cloud and data certification program which was used to skill up hundreds of technologists across the company
Market Research, Gap Analysis, and Risk Analysis for emerging technologies leading to strategic investment in go-to-market products and services, internal upskilling, and recruitment strategy.
Directly supported the company re-rganisation from matrix to circles leading to a smooth transition and minimal disruption to workflow

Used a data mesh approach to develop an architecture to aggregate 20 disparate data scources from on-premise, cloud storage, and streaming over the air sources to enable data analytics to feed insights to R&D, Sales, Engineering, and Marketing. A key focus was put on cost, security, and reliability

Developed and ran a series of classes to upskill client technical engineers in cloud and data best practices allowing the client to take on more responsibility for development and ongion maintenance internally, reducing their overall costs
Created an architecture for a digital onboard vehicle instruction manual which then gained investment to be developed and deployed in vehicles
Co-developed an internal manual showcasing common cloud architecture patterns reducing the need for projects to re-invent the wheel each time
work.summary: Futurice had five go-to-market pillars. I was the lead for the Cloud and Data Platforms pillar.

work.name: Futurice
highlights: Supported 30 people across 6 cross functional teams of developers, designers, and data scientists as a cloud architect. This built trust with out teams and the client leading to project investments in the hundreds of millions of dollars
Facilitated creation of OKR's which ensured that the account and all the projects were focused on the right goals and in line with the national and global company OKR's
Facilitated conflict escalation that resulted in several major issues being resolved to everyones satisfaction without requiering further escalation
Acted as a role model for cultural change within the client organisation leading to several new projects starting within the areas of innovation and emerging technologies

Developed onboarding materials and ran onboarding sessions for all projects and people in the account, enabling the teams to start with a core understanding of the client environments, contact peoples, and procedures
work.summary: I was the technical account lead for one of our major accounts with a leading automotive company. This role was focused on client relationship building, as well as supporting our teams on a technical level as well as a well-being level. I was responsible for project budgeting, forecasting, burn downs, project health, and overall project delivery and success, as well as project discovery, requirements gathering, proposal writing, pitching, estimations, and contract negotiation

work.name: Futurice
highlights: Supported 6 direct report technologists and data scientists up to expert level, mentor for 3 technologists, whose feedback indicated that I was an enthusiastic and empathetic leader who supported them in achieving their goals
Supported in career path planning using SMART goals leading to engaged and enthusiastic people
Gave recommendations leading to career advancement and salary increase for my people as a reflection of their great work
Applied servant leadership on a daily basis, for advice, challenging ideas, and conflict resolution,  which created an open and safe environment to discuss any topics
Applied early caring, well-being, and stress management, which resulted in engaged and focused people avoiding burnout
work.summary:
As an engineering manager (supervisor) at Futurice, a core part of my philosophy was to build trusting and caring relationships.

This has developed through communications training with [GreenElephant](https://greenelephant.org/), internal training in non-violent communication, and taking inspiration from leaders such as Kim Scott (Radical Candor) and Bren√© Brown (Dare to Lead). I love feedback and am continually adapting and evolving my approach so as best to meet the needs of each of the individuals that I oversee. Being able to support my supervisees and see them evolve and progress in their careers has been one of the most fulfilling experiences I have had so far.

work.name: Futurice
highlights: Developed the core backend system based on the Hexagonal paradigm and a microservice architecture which decoupled services enabling best testing practices to be applied. This resulted in confidence for the system, as well as a significant reduction in development time for features added years after the initial project had started
Implemented a message queue microservice using rabbit-mq enabling event driven processing
Wrote and deployed docker files used in conjunction with Openshift for CI/CD, testing, deployment, and system management

As the primary technical contact for the client I built a trusting and open relationship that lead to continued investment at the project level, and increased investment resulting in several new projects
Lead the team in task discovery, documentation, and estimation, enabling the junior developers to feel ownership for the sprint, gain hands on experience, and progress in their roles

Configured Jira to fit our exact project requirements in a cross functional team, with multiple boards and multiple board types, across three horizons of delivery (sprints, short term, long term) enabling a complex project team and process to work efficently in Jira
Caoched a developer in the team for six months leading to her taking over my role as I moved out of the project
work.summary:
I was lead developer for a multi-year multi-million euro project for a leading automotive company.
The core technology stack was React and Typescript on the front end, GraphQL for the front end API layer, REST for the backend API layer, NodeJs for the core backend services, and Clojure for some of the additional microservices used to load Java data analytics libraries. Testing was done with Jest and Cypress, and the entire system was deployed using Docker and Openshift (RedHat K8s).

work.name: Amber Road
highlights: Requirements gathering and proposal writing
Implementing custom client changes to core software
Environment initialisation, onsite deployment, and client training
Training new staff members
work.summary: Amber road built software to support multi-national companies with supply chain logistics, import/export tariffs, restricted screen lists, and product management.

work.name: Revelian
highlights: Developed the front end for a new video conferencing software using AngularJS, Flash and Twitter Bootstrap
Supported the migration from the legacy Cold Fusion tech stack into a modern Java based micro-services architecture hosted on AWS
work.summary: Revelian developed solutions to assist in talent acquisition, with a focus on psychometrics. These came in the form of assessments, quiz's, skill checklists, and interactive games.

work.name: JuniorCru
highlights: Responsible for requirements gathering, proposal writing, estimation, project management and delivery
Responsible for full project lifecycle. Development, testing, deployment, and maintenance
Tech lead and lead developer for projects with Virgin Australia, Corporate Realestate Australia, Careers Australia, and a number of smaller initiatives
work.summary:
JuniorCru was a web development consultancy primarily in the field of eCommerce and brochure-ware websites.
The core tech stack was PHP with Wordpress, AngularJS, Less, AWS, MySQL, with Jira and Confluence for project management.

work.name: Kintek Web Devlopment
highlights: Responsible for project specification, scoping, documentation and management
Full project lifecycle: development, domain registration, deployment, testing, maintenance
work.summary: Kintek was a small family run web development agency focused on developing bespoke eCommerce solutions, web applications, and mobile applications.

volunteer.summary:
Unusual Pioneers is a pioneering platform for corporate leaders and social intrapreneurs turning business into a force for good. We support the work of social intrapreneurs through mentoring, peer-to-peer support, and involvement of executives across industries. 

Learn more on unusualpioneers.com

certificates.name: Amazon Web Services Solutions Architect - Professional
Amazon Web Services DevOps Engineer - Professional
Amazon Web Services Data Analytics (formerly Big Data) Specialty

references.name: üë©‚Äçüíª Leilei Ouyang üêò
references.reference:
Kalki has been an encouraging, inspiring and empathetic supervisor during my time at Futurice. He encourages me to learn and experiment with different technologies, inspires me to expand my skill set and take on new challenges, and provides me valuable guidance on career progression. 

Kalki possesses a humble and participative leadership style through active listening, comprehensive analysis, constructive escalation and productive problem-solving which make him an empathetic leader as well as an outstanding team player.
